direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the collection by adding or removing elements.
Both methods involve adding or removing multiple elements from the collection.
Both methods involve removing elements from the collection, though removeAll removes multiple elements at once.
Both methods involve removing elements based on a condition, though removeIf uses a predicate.
Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, though retainAll removes elements not in the specified collection.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding collections to the composite is necessary to set up the state before removing elements.
Removing multiple elements can be part of the test setup or teardown.
Checking if an element is still in the collection after removal can be used to verify the correctness of the remove operation.
